    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    DashboardController
    The DashboardController class handles user interactions on the dashboard screen.
    Guest
    The Guest class represents a guest in the hotel reservation system.
    GuestController
    The GuestController class handles the interaction between the user interface and the guest data operations.
    GuestData
    The GuestData class provides CRUD operations for managing guest data in the database.
    HotelSystem
    The HotelSystem class provides functionalities for managing a hotel reservation system, including managing guests, rooms, and reservations, as well as user authentication.
    LoginController
    The LoginController class handles user interactions with the login screen.
    Main
     
    ResController
    The ResController class handles user interactions with the reservation management screen.
    Reservation
    The Reservation class represents a hotel reservation.
    Reservation.Status
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a reservation.
    ReservationData
    The ReservationData class provides CRUD operations for managing reservations in the database.
    Room
    The Room class represents a room in the hotel system.
    Room.RoomType
    Enumeration representing the possible types of rooms.
    RoomController
    The RoomController class handles user interactions with the room management screen.
    RoomData
    The RoomData class provides CRUD operations for managing room data in the database.
    SqlConnector
    The SqlConnector class provides methods for managing the database connection.
    User
    The User class represents a user in the system.
    UserData
    The UserData class provides methods for managing user data in the database.
